page.title: 16Housing in Uyeasound.
page.content: In Uyeasound you can find lots of croft houses.Some almost as they were built,some have been changed,new rooms have been built on,everything has been modernised.There are also derelict crofthouses which were abandoned because the land was taken over for sheep so the people who lived on the crofts had to move away for other jobs. The other houses are the new ones which have been built.There are also old ones,sometimes cold and creaky, sometimes warm and cosy.Council houses have built,lots of them together,each with three bedroom There are also small ones for old people. My favourite house is my house.It is new,it has lots of rooms and is fine and warm in Winter.
